seg.quote: The ministry will have no alternative but to cut its expenditure.

sense.def:
The ministry of a religious person
je delo, ki ga verna oseba opravi glede na svoje versko prepričanje.

seg.quote: The central message of Christ's ministry was the concept of grace.

sense.def:
Ministry
je tudi skupno ime za duhovnike v nekaterih vejah krščanske Cerkve.

seg.quote: Michael had intended to join the ministry.
